original_text: It was decided that custom roles will be implemented to provide greater flexibility and granularity in access control.
units: It was decided that custom roles will be implemented to provide greater flexibility and granularity in access control .
that custom roles will be implemented to provide greater flexibility and granularity in access control
to provide greater flexibility and granularity in access control

original_text: Furthermore, the meeting addressed and clarified the rules governing inheritance for these roles, ensuring a clear understanding of how permissions will be propagated throughout the system.
units: Furthermore , the meeting addressed and clarified the rules governing inheritance for these roles , ensuring a clear understanding of how permissions will be propagated throughout the system .
clarified the rules governing inheritance for these roles , ensuring a clear understanding of how permissions will be propagated throughout the system
ensuring a clear understanding of how permissions will be propagated throughout the system

original_text: This task is assigned to @alice, who will be responsible for outlining the structure and relationships between the different custom roles.
units: This task is assigned to @alice , who will be responsible for outlining the structure and relationships between the different custom roles .
outlining the structure and relationships between the different custom roles

original_text: This responsibility lies with @bob, who will translate the clarified inheritance model into functional code within the authentication system.
units: This responsibility lies with @bob , who will translate the clarified inheritance model into functional code within the authentication system .

original_text: This review will involve relevant stakeholders to ensure the implemented custom roles and inheritance rules adhere to the organization's broader security and compliance requirements.
